\usepackage{minted}

second_line = 2
last_line = 'last'
\end{minted}


\section{wrap=False block}


\begin{minted}[mathescape, fontsize=\small, xleftmargin=0.5em]{python}
first_line = 1
second_line = 2
last_line = 'last'
\end{minted}



\begin{minted}[mathescape, fontsize=\small, xleftmargin=0.5em]{python}
plot(arange(10))
\end{minted}
